tool_description:
Beware! Our live match updates may be faster than other API's.
Enjoy our 24/7 wide coverage of real time scores data for 10 different sports and over 2,000 competitions worldwide, including Real-time Stats, Breaking News, In-Play Insights, Lineups, Live Tables, Fixtures, Social Buzz, Odds and much more.
Supported 10 Sports Types: Football, Rugby, Tennis, Basketball, Cricket, Ice Hockey, Baseball, Volleyball, American football and Handball.
name: AllScores

api_list.name: Athlete Small Image
api_list.description: Get athlete small image. It generates image/png.

required_parameters.name: athleteId
required_parameters.description: The athlete id.

required_parameters.name: imageVersion
required_parameters.description: The imageVersion value.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://allscores.p.rapidapi.com/api/allscores/img/small/athlete/53414/version/12"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "allscores.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://allscores.p.rapidapi.com/api/allscores/img/small/athlete/{athleteid}/version/{imageversion}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "allscores.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
